Publication peer-review and editorial work:

Editor of unfinished research anthology/collection

Continuous editorial work relating to book series, anthologies, and reference works. Editorial work related to a singular book or anthology should be registered as a publication.

Publication peer-review and editorial work:

Peer review of manuscripts

Please register activities regarding peer reviewing of manuscripts e.g. articles for national or international journals, books, research applications, or similar.
